import boxShadows from"assets/theme-dark/base/boxShadows";import typography from"assets/theme-dark/base/typography";import colors from"assets/theme-dark/base/colors";import borders from"assets/theme-dark/base/borders";// Material Dashboard 2 React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme-dark/functions/pxToRem";var md=boxShadows.md;var size=typography.size;var text=colors.text,background=colors.background;var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;var menu={defaultProps:{disableAutoFocusItem:true},styleOverrides:{paper:{minWidth:pxToRem(160),boxShadow:md,padding:"".concat(pxToRem(16)," ").concat(pxToRem(8)),fontSize:size.sm,color:text.main,textAlign:"left",backgroundColor:"".concat(background.card," !important"),borderRadius:borderRadius.md}}};export default menu;
